name: Intercept
long_description: Intercept lets CPG brands challenge incorrect charges from retail chains. It ingests all of a brandâ€™s fees across their retailer portals and emails, flags the fees that can be disputed, and automates away the mundane tasks involved in fee disputes. What previously took a team of people is now manageable by a single person.
one_liner: Helping CPG brands automatically flag and dispute invalid retail fees
